Reviews.Title: Worked great for two weeks, then died.
Reviews.Author: Krystal M. Maples "bringonthebling"
Reviews.Content: This camera was really impressive at the beginning (which was two weeks ago).  Really sharp images, etc.  One thing I hate is that you have to switch to another setting to see the pictures you just took.  There's not an instant playback feature.Yesterday, it died.  The CCD screen went black never to return.  I am hoping it is still under warranty.
